meanings.sent1: The linotyped article was printed in the newspaper yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The linotyped text was carefully arranged on the page.
meanings.sent3: I found an old linotyped book in the library, it was a blast from the past.
meanings.sent4: The linotyped words jumped off the page, bringing history to life.
meanings.sent5: The linotyped headline caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: having been set in type using a linotype machine
meanings.sent1: The linotyped document was ready for distribution.
meanings.sent2: The linotyped pages were neatly stacked on the desk.
meanings.sent3: She received a linotyped letter and was pleasantly surprised by the vintage touch.
meanings.sent4: The linotyped words stood out boldly against the white background.
meanings.sent5: The linotyped text had a classic feel to it.
